story: You find yourself standing in front of a large, metallic elevator door in the heart of the gang's stronghold. The door is old and worn, but it looks sturdy enough to withstand even the most intense battles. As you ponder your next move, you hear the sound of machinery humming in the distance, getting louder by the second.

actions.good: The elevator roars back to life, transporting you to a hidden floor where you discover a secret stash of valuable items. Your technical expertise pays off.
actions.bad: Your repairs trigger a chain reaction, causing the elevator to malfunction and start shooting out laser beams in all directions. You take damage as you try to dodge the blasts.

actions.good: You successfully hack into the system, unlocking a hidden menu that reveals the location of a secret stash of valuable items. Your digital prowess pays off.
actions.bad: The elevator's security systems detect your intrusion and activate a self-destruct sequence. You narrowly escape as the elevator explodes behind you, but the loot remains out of reach.

actions.good: The elevator lurches to life, and you find yourself transported to a hidden floor where you discover a secret stash of valuable items. Your boldness pays off.
actions.bad: The elevator's sudden movement causes you to lose your balance, and you take damage as you try to catch yourself.
